Package org.jsapar.error

Error handling and exceptions

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ErrorEventListener
    Interface for receiving event call-backs while parsing or composing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorEvent
    The event that is fired in any of the implementations of ParseTask, Composer or ConvertTask in case an error occured.
    ExceptionErrorEventListener
    This error event listener throws an unchecked exception upon the first error that occurs.
    MulticastErrorEventListener
    Distributes all error events to multiple ErrorEventListener instances.
    RecordingErrorEventListener
    Records all errors into a list of errors that can be retrieved with the method RecordingErrorEventListener.getErrors() later.
    ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener
    This error event listener records errors until it reaches a maximum number.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValidationAction
    Enum describing different actions to take upon validation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JSaParException
    Base class for all types of errors that can be added to an ErrorEvent
    JSaParNumberFormatException
    Actually just wraps the normal NumberFormatException so that it can be constructed with a cause.
    MaxErrorsExceededException
    Used by ThresholdRecordingErrorEventListener and is thrown when the maximum number of errors has occured.

Package org.jsapar.error Description

Error handling and exceptions

Contains different implementations of the ErrorEventListener interface. Create your own implementation if the existing ones do not cover your need.
